title: Ben Dragon's  - Freedom
description:
In this lecture Ben Dragon talks about what "Freedom" really is and how this word, 
(and similar words), are used to manipulate the actions of the public.




This is a supplement to his book but I'm sure that everyone will find some great! info in it as I did.

I found his stuff REALLY GOOD and I loved his book!.. something that I found tremendously insightful and very helpful in understanding what is going on in this world, who is running it and how they are doing it, and it was a fantastic help in my understanding of myself and the reason that I am here! The ending of his book just BLEW ME AWAY!



This guy not only sees through the system, but PROVIDES SOLUTIONS and give answers. Answers that helped me a lot. That's a hell of a lot more than other researchers can say who just constantly say that the sky is falling and provide nothing! to help us.

I realize that most people just entertainment themselves reading other people's work & distracting themselves from reality, but I actually personally benefited from reading what this guy has to say! So I thought that I would share it with others.



Oh... the website that I got it from was;


                    clarity.sf-w.net




Ben Dragon's E-mail address is:


                     b-c AT sf-w.net



He has lots more stuff up on his site, but I only have a DSL line and uploads suck!



He has more stuff about this and other things on his website.


I hope you all like it as much as I do.


Thomas C.
